participant_1.background:
I felt like I was going to have a heart attack when my coworker yelled at me in front of the whole office.
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.
i have a crush on my co worker.
I remember the smell of my grandmother's house.
I have come to terms with my past and am now focused on helping others.

participant_2.background:
I'm not big on Comic Con because it's too crowded, but my shop has a couple of pieces of custom upholstery that were commissioned by comic book artists.
I'll always cherish the time I spent playing with my siblings and cousins in the backyard.
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing this fine day?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy spending time with my family and dog, as well as playing video games. What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy taking pictures, reading, and watching movies. I also have a crush on my coworker, but I'm too shy to tell her how I feel.
I know the feeling! I have a crush on a girl I work with too, but I'm too afraid to ask her out.
We should start a support group for people who are too shy to ask out their crushes!
That's a great idea! We could call it the "Shy Crush Club."
I love it! We could meet up every week and talk about our crushes and how to get the courage to ask them out.
That would be so much fun! I'm so glad I met you today.
Me too! I feel like I've finally found someone who understands what I'm going through.
